boiler_page.title: Residential Boiler Repair, Installation, and Maintenance
boiler_page.first_paragraph: When it comes to keeping your family and friends safe, warm, and comfortable throughout the cold, harsh winter months, you can rely on the unmatched expertise of MDS Mechanical. Over the years, we have built up a strong reputation as being one of the most knowledgeable, honest, and reliable HVAC and residential boiler replacement, installation, maintenance, and repair providers across Hamilton and the GTHA. If your current boiler or combi boiler system has reached the end of its lifecycle, or you are looking to be proactive and upgrade it, our expert gas technicians can make excellent replacement and installation recommendations that are perfectly tailored to the needs of your house and family.
boiler_page.second_paragraph: We take great pride in delivering high-quality and trustworthy services, which is why we always schedule service consultations to thoroughly inspect your boiler and accurately diagnose the problem before providing you with multiple solutions so you can decide which route to take.
